page.title: 15WARE WEEK
page.content: On Saturday,8th June there was a { {pavement artists competition.}The mayor and mayoress were the judges and the mayor gave all those who entered a Mars bar.Forty two children entered.I didn't win but I enjoyed my Mars bar. On 9th June my mum,my brother and I went to the{Ware Week Dog Show.}We came first in the 'Dog the Judge would like to take home' contest,second in 'chld handling' and fourth in the 'Oldest Dog'. There was a fete there with a cake stall,toy stall and a table with all the rosettes.I would have enjoyed the Dog Show even more if it had not been raining.
